summary.description: > LOW CONFIDENCE! | > CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'adversarial', 'Adversarial Attacks', 'off-the-manifold adversarial', 'gray-box' | Image Super-Resolution as a Defense Against Adversarial Attacks | super-resolution-adversarial-defense | We use wavelet denoising and image super resolution as pre-processing steps to defend images against adversarial attacks. If you find our work useful in your research or publication, please cite our work:
summary.name: Super-Resolution
